attributes.action: Resign, along with every other politician, due to "dishonesty" in expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The entire lot of you should stand down due to the shambles in expenses. We are sick to the hind teeth of you all.
Revolution cannot be far off, you disgust us all, and are an embarrasment to this country

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
